column5: Pikeie has a nice 5" gash on one shin of his suit ,Those new auger blades are sharp !  Anyone have suggestions on repair methods. I was thinking duct tape myself  TB
Thanks Wayne Good idea ,its in a protected area ( not knees or butt) that should work  Surprised your suggestion didn't involve rivets !  TB
How are you going to hold the patch in place if you don't use rivits?
thats what the duct tape is for !
I do have a couple bins full of "fabric rivets"... but not quite what they're intended for !
I wonder if the rules for  PFD's holds true for Floatation Suits?  Any tear or hole in a PFD renders it useless under the present regulations.
I bought a piece of nylon and I used marine GOOP to put it on. Now it takes me a couple of minutes to actually find where I cut it.  Do not use an iron on patch,
"I do have a couple bins full of "fabric rivets"... but not quite what they're intended for !"  Whats a fabric rivet? new one for me
